description: BE AWARE⭐ - I speak in multiple venues, events, churches, schools, colleges, community centers and much more. People want the truth. Even if they are not ready to receive it. Many thought vaccines were the only circumstance that we ""look forward"" to dealing with. #rfidchip is another. The ""Mark of the beast"" is a very real thing. Just not aa spooky as people make it seem. It is technology grafted and it is utilized by the ""elites"" who push for #depopulation and to control the others who remain. Simply refuse and if we refuse we should all be willing to face the consequences. I indeed will not be getting chipped. I don't know about you. 🤷🏿‍♂️. P.s, YES Bill Gates is funding this and is pushing it through his co-funded organization called: ""G.A.V.I"" = The Global, Alliance for Vaccination and Immunization. Surprised?🧐 #rizzaislam #rizzawithfacts #intellectualxtremist #WEAREFARRAKHAN
